author: patrickl
msg: Add code to catch uncaught java.lang.Error's thrown by the target application. This feature shuts down applications that are in an corrupted state because a thread has unexpected died due to an unanticipated system problem.

author: patrickl
msg: Correct typo in filter code that was incorrectly setting the useSystemIn flag when a filter is used.

author: patrickl
msg: Fix bug where System.exit() was being called before allowing the StreamConnectors to flush any of their unflushed output
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'J2EE_14_06'.
